akn:subsection.akn:heading: Receipt of Border Patrol Rate of Pay.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Any pay in addition to the basic border patrol rate of pay for a border patrol agent resulting from application of the level 1 border patrol rate of pay or the level 2 border patrol rate of pay—
(e) Travel time to and from home and duty station by a border patrol agent shall not be considered hours of work under any provision of law.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Leave Without Pay and Substitution of Hours.—

akn:content.akn:p: (g) Nothing in this section shall be construed to limit the authority of U.S. Customs and Border Protection to require a border patrol agent to perform hours of overtime work in accordance with the needs of U.S. Customs and Border Protection, including if needed in the event of a local or national emergency.
